import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; im export default function Product({product}){ const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

ref : {product.cmp}

name : {product.name}

categorie : {product.categorie}

prix : {product.prix}

quanity : {product.quanity}

dispatch({type:'delete',payload:{e:product}})}> Delete dispatch({type:'getProduct',payload:{e:product,upd:true}})}> Update
) }
